Trustee_0_pre_3.name: Liam OConnor
Trustee_0_pre_3.content: During the investment process, I demonstrated my ability to secure a favorable profit while adhering to the agreed-upon distribution plan. Retaining 40% of the profits showcased my competence in managing investments, reinforcing my reputation as a pragmatic and calculating trustee who can deliver on promises without undermining the investor's interests.

Investor_0_pre_5.name: Liam OConnor
Investor_0_pre_5.content: My behavior during the investment process demonstrated vigilance and a strong focus on protecting my interests. However, the significant discrepancy between the expected and actual returns negatively impacted my outcome. While I maintained due diligence, the failure to receive the promised 70% of profits highlights areas for improvement in my selection process for trustees. Overall, I am seen as attentive and protective, but this experience may detract from my reputation as a successful investor.

Trustee_0_pre_6.name: Liam OConnor
Trustee_0_pre_6.content: Throughout the transaction with Nadia Novak, I effectively executed the agreed allocation plan, securing a commendable 40% profit while ensuring significant returns for the investor. I maintained transparency and reliability, showcasing my competence and pro-social behavior. My ability to adhere to previous commitments and navigate investment challenges has reinforced my reputation as a pragmatic trustee. My track record of no rejections emphasizes my reliability and strengthens my standing in the investment community.
